title: Rod of Harmony
summaries: The Rod of Harmony is a post-Moon Lord tool. It functions identically to the Rod of Discord, instantly teleporting the player to the location of the cursor when used, but does not inflict the Chaos State debuff, allowing the player to teleport safely and as many times as desired without any drawbacks.
It can only be obtained by throwing a <linked>Rod of Discord</linked> into <linked>Shimmer</linked> in any world where the <linked>Moon Lord</linked> has been defeated.

statistics.Tooltip: Teleports you to the position of the mouse
statistics.Sell: 10 GC
